name: Hentai Strip Ball
description:
Strip the girls by shooting the green area with your ball. It is a classy puzzle game that will addict you while relaxing your mind. The game play resembles to a "minimalistic mini-golf" experience.

You have to complete each level with max 2 shots.
There are 90 cleverly designed levels with different girls.
Expect sticks, triangles, circles, crazy rotating stuff, clocks, gunners, breakable objects, portals and much more!

If you hit the bright spot or complete the level just with 1 shot, you get extra score and more stars.

According to the number of stars you collect, you can view/unlock girls clearer.

Bounce your ball from the walls for even higher scores.

More stars, better pictures!
More score, better ranking on leaderboard!
